synopsis.text: Set in a futuristic version of Tokyo in the year 2060 as the city prepares to host its third Olympic Games, this anime tells the story of a secret robotics project that gets disrupted by a terrorist threat. The protagonist sets out to thwart the terrorists and protect the heroine, with whom he has fallen in love. With the Olympics providing an urgent backdrop, the story unfolds at a brisk pace, filled with twists and turns. The protagonist battles the threats on multiple fronts - taking down the terrorists even as he races to safeguard the AI project. Through it all, his desire to shield his beloved from harm fuels his relentless efforts. As layers of deception get peeled away, the truth behind the terrorist plot comes to light in climactic fashion. The protagonist perseveres against long odds, resulting in a conclusion that’s both moving and triumphant. This suspenseful anime mixes sci-fi, action and romance within the high-stakes crucible of the Olympic games. The dramatic stakes and emotional hooks will keep viewers engaged throughout the story’s unpredictable, yet ultimately heroic journey.
